PerfectNetExp.abs: 铁兰属 in English, translation,... ... 毛兰属 eria 眉兰属 ophrys 美冠兰属 eulophia.
ophryon 眼眉, ophrys 印堂, ophryophryne 拟角蟾属

means.word_mean: 1. a hardy genus of terrestrial orchids of Europe and northern Africa and western Asia

auth_sentence.content: Their scientific name Ophrys is the Greek word for "eyebrow", referring to the furry edges of the lips of several species.
